round_4: New Golden Furnishers Co is a furniture manufacturer based in New Delhi, India. They specialize in producing office chairs, double desks, school and college furniture, single seat desks, kids school furniture, workstations, cafe furniture, and other related items. Their products include writing arm chairs, auditorium furniture, study and computer tables, office tables, school furniture such as library furniture, visitor fix chairs, and high back office chairs. They also offer metal office furniture, stainless steel chairs, sofas, blood donor chairs, restaurant tables, and chairs, as well as institutional furniture. The company is known for its elegant designs and comfortable seating positions, and their products are widely used in schools and colleges worldwide.
